recipe.title: Mediterranean eggplants
recipe.instructions:
1. Wash eggplants, cut the stems and halve lengthwise. Scoop out the middle.
  2. In a bowl mix and combine sausage meat, egg, feta cheese, mozzarella, almonds and pepper.
  3. With a spoon, stuff the eggplants.
  4. Sprinkle with breadcrumbs (about tablespoon on each eggplant) and olive oil.
  5. Place the eggplants on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake in the oven for 25 minutes on 230C.
  6. Serve hot, sprinkled with fresh, chopped dill, chives or basil.
recipe.summary: The recipe Mediterranean eggplants can be made in about 45 minutes. This recipe serves 4. One serving contains 679 calories, 30g of protein, and 47g of fat. For $3.29 per serving, this recipe covers 31% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe from Foodista requires sausage without the casing, mozzarella cheese, dill, and eggplants. 6 people have tried and liked this recipe. Only a few people really liked this main course. With a spoonacular score of 75%, this dish is solid. Similar recipes are Roasted Eggplants and Tomatoes, Spiced Baby Eggplants, and Roasted Eggplants with Herbs.
ingredients: Fresh dill, chives or basil, chopped
350 g fresh sausage without the casing, approximately 8 links
